Bsp_VidDecColorParams Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_SET_VIDEO_COLOR.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::channelNum

Channel number for which these parameters are to be applied.

Channel number will be 0 in most cases, unless the device is capable of multi-channel capture like in TVP5158 in which case channel number can be from 0 .. Device specific max channels-1.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::videoBrightness

Video brightness, value is device specific.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_DEFAULT when device specific default needs to be applied in current IOCTL call.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_NO_CHANGE when last applied value needs to be retained in current IOCTL call.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::videoContrast

Video contrast, value is device specific.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_DEFAULT when device specific default needs to be applied in current IOCTL call.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_NO_CHANGE when last applied value needs to be retained in current IOCTL call.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::videoHue

Video hue, value is device specific.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_DEFAULT when device specific default needs to be applied in current IOCTL call.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_NO_CHANGE when last applied value needs to be retained in current IOCTL call.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::videoSaturation

Video saturation, value is device specific.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_DEFAULT when device specific default needs to be applied in current IOCTL call.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_NO_CHANGE when last applied value needs to be retained in current IOCTL call.

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecColorParams::videoSharpness

Video sharpness, value is device specific.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_DEFAULT when device specific default needs to be applied in current IOCTL call.

This field can be set to BSP_VID_DEC_NO_CHANGE when last applied value needs to be retained in current IOCTL call.
